title: The Patriarchy Paradox
description:
A view on patriarchy to provoke debate: 'if liberty means anything at all, it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear' (George Orwell). Use it or lose it.

The statements and opinions in this video are not necessarily agreed or authorised by Eton College or its subsidiary companies.

00:00 What is the patriarchy paradox?
02:16 Why debate matters
02:42 The protector role as the core of masculinity
04:52 Biological essentialism
08:30 Male expendability
10:47 Common objections: witch hunts, coverture laws, voting, rape
13:36 Radical feminism as a closed system
15:07 Traditional masculine virtues
17:57 Fear and courage
19:59 Honour
23:08 Women's choices reinforce patriarchy
30:29 Masculinity as the antithesis of paedophilia

I haven't tried to be original. The references, in chronological order, are below. See Steven Pinker's 'The Blank Slate' or Debra Soh's 'The End of Gender' if you're keen to learn more.

Overview of the relevant science:
https://www.ucd.ie/artspgs/langimp/genderbrain.pdf

Definition of patriarchy - the Concise Encyclopedia of Sociology edited by George Ritzer, J. Michael Ryan (Wiley, 2010), p.441

Doris Lessing's remarks
https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2001/aug/14/edinburghfestival2001.edinburghbookfestival2001

The Marvel movies
http://edwardfeser.blogspot.com/2019/10/masculinity-and-marvel-movies.html

Tooley, The Miseducation of Women (Rowman & Littlefield, 2003), p.132

Free speech - Stephen Hicks, Explaining Postmodernism (Connor Court, 2019), p.224

Procreate, provide, protect - David Gilmore, Manhood in the Making (Yale, 1990), pp.222-3

Gametes - https://www.wsj.com/articles/the-dangerous-denial-of-sex-11581638089
See also https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s12129-020-09877-8

Byrne - https://arcdigital.media/is-sex-socially-constructed-81cf3ef79f07

https://thehill.com/blogs/pundits-blog/civil-rights/332246-if-progressives-believe-gender-is-fluid-then-why-not-race

https://www.marinecorpstimes.com/news/your-marine-corps/2015/09/10/mixed-gender-teams-come-up-short-in-marines-infantry-experiment/

https://runrepeat.com/state-of-ultra-running

https://www.pnas.org/content/115/4/E832

Male violence - Wrangham and Peterson, 'Demonic Males' (Bloomsbury, 1996), pp. 125, 172

Standing up to fight https://journals.plos.org/plosone/articleid=10.1371/journal.pone.0019630

Evolution of the hand
https://jeb.biologists.org/content/216/2/236

A world without men
Martin van Creveld, The Privileged Sex (DLVC Enterprises, 2013), p.236

Witches
Christina Larner, Witchcraft and Religion (Blackwell, 1985), p.28

Jail rape
https://www.ncjrs.gov/App/Publications/abstract.aspx?ID=139657

Studies cited in the table
https://quillette.com/2020/07/27/the-myth-of-pervasive-misogyny/

Chagla's ruling
Anjani Kant, Women and Law (APH, 2003), pp. 138, 141

Percentage of feminist women
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-47006912

Closed system
Scruton, Ellis-Jones and O’Keefe, Education and Indoctrination (Sherwood Press, 1985)

Jonathan Gottschall, The Professor in the Cage (Penguin, 2015), p.90-91

Leacock, Eleanor, et al. “Women's Status in Egalitarian Society
www.jstor.org/stable/2741993

Boundaries
Manhood in the Making (Yale, 1990), p.76-77

Women's intrasexual aggression
https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/behavioral-and-brain-sciences/article/staying-alive-evolution-culture-and-womens-intrasexual-aggression/2728A6266E77F48243975BD5268B8012

See also 
https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1002/ab.20413

Relational aggression
https://www.psychologytoday.com/gb/blog/out-the-ooze/201506/is-the-tongue-the-sword-woman

See also Randal Collins, 'Violence: A Micro-Sociological Theory' (Princeton, 2008), p.159-60:
'Girls are more active in malicious gossiping and spreading rumours...Girls verbally bully others chiefly in terms of their low status in the sexual attractiveness/dating market; boys physically bully others chiefly for their perceived low standing in physical aggression'.

Female power of sexual choice
Moxon, 'The Woman Racket' (Imprint Academic, 2008), p.54

Ovulation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17466990/

There has never been a matriarchy - 'Demonic Males', p.125

https://quillette.com/2018/12/20/feminisms-dependency-trap/

https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2019/apr/16/why-andrea-dworkin-is-the-radical-visionary-feminist-we-need-in-our-terrible-times

Dworkin
Woman Hating (Dutton, 1974), p.190-92.
https://www.feministes-radicales.org/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/Andrea-DWORKIN-Woman-Hating-A-Radical-Look-at-Sexuality-1974.pdf

Simone de Beauvoir
https://www.theguardian.com/world/2001/feb/24/jonhenley

Child abusers
https://doi.org/10.1177/1043986204271704 and https://doi.org/10.1037/1076-8971.4.1-2.505

Childbearing
Carle Zimmerman, Family and Civilization (ISI, 2008), p.197

Family
http://www.civitas.org.uk/content/files/cs31.pdf
